snippet: Frank Gaul and his wife left their native Guyana in 2010 to be closer to their daughter and her children in New York, but his night job as a security guard limits the time he can spend with them.
abstract: Community Service Society of New York, one of seven organizations supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Frank Gaul of Queens pay for classes and offers him financial assistance for transportation costs.
lead_paragraph: Frank Gaul and his wife left their native Guyana in 2010 to be closer to their daughter and her children in New York, but his night job as a security guard limits the time he can spend with them.

headline.print_headline: Traveling a Long Way From Home to Be Near Family He Rarely Gets to See
headline.main: A Long Way From Guyana, Near a Family He Rarely Gets to See

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: New York Times Neediest Cases Fund

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Community Service Society of New York
